name: Grimfire (charliemoyes)
description:
The King has sent you on a quest to retrieve an Artifact from the far lands of the Thousand Spike Mountains. Sneak your way past the guardians and obstacles in your path, search for any signs of life, and make gameplay-based choices during your quest.

Inspired by Skyrim quests, this was developed as a student project at the University of Northampton for Games Design and Narrative Design modules.
